results.question: What is first index value of an array?
array = [1,2,3,4,5] What is the length of this array?
Which definition below best describe an array?
results.correct_answer: An array is a special variable, which can hold more than one value at a time.
incorrect_answers: An array is a beam of light.
An array is a function identifier that can hold more than one parameter.
An array is a special function, which can hold more than one value at a time.
